speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: Thank yeh kindly! We’ll be shipping these out immediately!

speaker: Alma
dialogue: Oh, and []? Would you mind adding in these Thanksgiving cards, too?

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: That actually reminds me of a story!

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: One day, Alma and I went over to my parents’ house with the kids…

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: And we just got so stuffed with turkey that we were all so tired. Alma got up to put a dish away…

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: And she was gone for such a long time I started to worry about her.

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: So I go to the kitchen to see what’s wrong…

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: And she’s just standing there, plate in hand, completely asleep!

speaker: Alma
dialogue: I’ve never fallen asleep standing up before! It was humiliating!

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: Well, I thought it was cute.

speaker: Alma
dialogue: That your wife shares the same skills as a horse?

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: Horses can sleep standing up? Well, I think that’s pretty cute, too.
